title: Theft With Permission
itunes:title: Theft With Permission
description:
The Saints Row reboot is upon us, and, well, look, we need to talk about it. Also: Brad saw Pentiment (sort of), Alex played Splatoon 3, it's time for our annual Madden check-in, we run down all the news out of Gamescom, try to get a handle on the Embracer Group's latest shopping spree, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate for versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:05) I was promised jam
(00:03:43) Show rundown
(00:05:13) Saints Row [Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 23, 2022
(00:39:15) First Break
(00:39:19) Cult of the Lamb [Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 11, 2022
(00:41:54) Midnight Fight Express [Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 23, 2022
(00:49:25) Madden NFL 23 [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 19, 2022
(00:55:00) Pentiment [Xbox One, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox Series X|S] on Nov 15, 2022
(01:06:38) Splatoon 3 [Nintendo Switch] on Sep 09, 2022
(01:16:57) Second Break
(01:17:02) News
(01:17:12) Gamescom 2022
(01:18:04) DualSense Edge
(01:23:21) Moving Out 2
(01:24:13) Where Winds Meet
(01:25:37) Killer Klowns from Outer Space: The Game
(01:26:49) The Expanse: A Telltale Series
(01:27:55) New Tales from the Borderlands
(01:29:04) Dead Island 2
(01:32:32) Gamescom announcements for 2022
(01:37:22) PS VR2 slated for early 2023
(01:40:25) All will be Embracer Group(ed)
(01:54:23) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:57:00) Mysterious Benefactor Tiers
(01:58:47) Nextlander wants to hear from you
(02:00:05) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
